ticket.subject: Cannot login to account
ticket.description: I have been locked out after 3 failed login attempts. Password reset not working.

ticket.subject: App crashes on startup
ticket.description: Application crashes immediately on launch with memory allocation error.

ticket.subject: Billing inquiry duplicate charge
ticket.description: Charged twice this month. Two identical charges. Please refund the duplicate.

ticket.subject: Feature request dark mode
ticket.description: Would be nice to have dark mode. Many users requesting this feature.

ticket.subject: Production system down urgent
ticket.description: CRITICAL: Production server offline. All customers unable to access service.

ticket.subject: 2FA setup fails repeatedly
ticket.description: Cannot enable two-factor authentication. Setup fails at step 2.

ticket.subject: Credit card payment declined
ticket.description: Payment was declined with no error message. What is the issue?

ticket.subject: Bug CSV export corrupted files
ticket.description: CSV export creates corrupted files that cannot be opened.

ticket.subject: Enhancement bulk user management
ticket.description: Could you add bulk user management capability?

ticket.subject: Account locked security breach
ticket.description: Account locked due to suspected unauthorized access. How to regain access?

ticket.subject: API documentation incorrect
ticket.description: API reference documentation is outdated and incorrect.

ticket.subject: Request refund for subscription
ticket.description: Request full refund for subscription. Service not as expected.

ticket.subject: Severe performance degradation
ticket.description: Application extremely slow. Takes 5+ minutes for basic operations.

ticket.subject: Password reset email not received
ticket.description: Clicked reset password but never received email confirmation link.

ticket.subject: Feature scheduling appointment
ticket.description: Could you add appointment scheduling to calendar module?

ticket.subject: SECURITY SQL injection vulnerability
ticket.description: Potential SQL injection vulnerability in user search endpoint. Immediate patch needed.

ticket.subject: Invoice charge discrepancy
ticket.description: Invoice shows different charges than quoted.

ticket.subject: iOS app crashes between tabs
ticket.description: iOS app crashes when switching between tabs.

ticket.subject: Feature integration Salesforce CRM
ticket.description: Can you integrate with Salesforce CRM? Enterprise customers would benefit.

ticket.subject: Account access successfully restored
ticket.description: Thank you for restoring account access. Everything working perfectly.

ticket.subject: Cannot upload files error
ticket.description: File upload feature returns too large error for small PDFs.

ticket.subject: Subscription cancellation request
ticket.description: I want to cancel my subscription immediately. How to proceed?

ticket.subject: Bug report generation fails
ticket.description: Monthly report generation fails silently without error notification.

ticket.subject: UI improvement suggestion navigation
ticket.description: Navigation menu could be more intuitive. Users often confused.

ticket.subject: Account locked critical business
ticket.description: Cannot access account. This is blocking critical business operations.

ticket.subject: Email notifications broken
ticket.description: Not receiving email notifications despite enabling them in settings.

ticket.subject: Discount code not working
ticket.description: Promotional code not being accepted at checkout.

ticket.subject: Data export issue database timeout
ticket.description: Unable to export account data. Database connection timeout error.

ticket.subject: Feature enhancement save filters
ticket.description: Add ability to save filter preferences for recurring searches.

ticket.subject: Critical bug urgent production
ticket.description: Bulk import feature corrupting existing data. Production impacted. URGENT.
